La elaboración de quesos su principal fuente de ingreso la que cubre sus gastos familiares; viven en casa propia ubicado en la Provincia Ingavi – Achica Baja (a dos horas y media de la ciudad de El Alto). 

El crédito lo destinará a la compra de una vaca lechera de mediana calidad  para así incrementar la producción de los quesos y por ende mejorar sus ingresos.
 
Es el cuarto  crédito con Impro, el buen comportamiento de pago permite aprobarlo otro préstamo solicitado por la prestataria.
texts.en:
Flora is a small agricultural and dairy farmer who makes cheeses to sell in the markets of the city of El Alto. She lives with her son, who works as a long-distance bus driver. Cheese-making is her primary source of income, which she uses to cover the family's living expenses. They live in their own house in Achica Baja, in the province of Ingavi, two and a half hours from the city of El Alto. She will use the loan to buy a dairy cow to increase her cheese production and thus her income. This is her fourth loan with Impro, and her history of faithful payment has ensured its approval.

Translated from Spanish by Andrea Rosenberg, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase a dairy cow to increase her cheese production

loans.name: Carlos Ernesto

texts.es:
El señor Carlos Ernesto y su señora esposa Lourdes  Martínez viven en la ciudad de Morelos, Coahuila.
El trabaja para una agencia de transportes en Nava, Coahuila (cerca de su ciudad de residencia), desde hace 9 años, desempeñándose en el área de operador.
Ella esta a cargo del hogar y de la familia, ellos demostrando una gran estabilidad en su matrimonio luchan por brindarle a sus hijos una mayor comodidad en casa; este es el motivo por el cual tramitan este crédito, para la colocación de una losa de concreto de un cuarto en construcción para la ampliación de las recamaras.
texts.en:
Mr. Carlos Ernesto and his wife Lourdes Martínez live in the city of Morelos, Coahuila. For nine years he has worked as an operator for a transport company in Nava, Coahuila (close to where they live); she is a homemaker. Together they provide a united front to provide a stable and comfortable home for their children. This is the reason they are applying for the loan; they need to complete the roof in one of the rooms under construction to enlarge the rooms.

Translated from Spanish by Pamela Carreón, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To complete the roof in one of the rooms under construction.

loans.name: Geruzalem Group

texts.en:
At age 24, Judine P. has come a very long way. Being a single mother, a student, and a business owner can be very challenging, but very rewarding. When speaking about the rewards, Judine is open about how she struggled to feed herself and child daily prior to her 1S. loan. Going on her 3rd loan now, she proudly speaks about how her business profits now give her the ability to not only pay for her school, provide for daily meal for herself and child, but also give her the ability to contribute to her family.

She is not alone in her increased profits. The Geruzalem Group, of which she is a representative, is made up of 14 other male and female business owners. Many of the members recount how they were not working and dreamed of creating a business for themselves, but never had the funds to do so. The loan they received enabled them to do so.

Judine, who sells fruits, vegetables and live animals in the big city, looks forward to further growth in her business and her area. On behalf of Judine, Geruzalem, and Esperanza we thank you for you for your support.

loans.use: Fresh vegetables, livestock

loans.name: Antonia

texts.es:
Antonia es socia del Banco Comunal Alianza
Antonia es conviviente, tiene 47 años y 2 hijos, Antonia viaja a la ciudad de Lima en donde adquiere huevo, papel higiénico y otros productos según la demanda, estos productos los vende al por mayor en la ciudad de Ayacucho.
Antonia necesita un préstamo de 1200 soles dinero que será invertido en la compra de papel higiénico.
Antonia sueña con aumentar su negocio, su hijo culmine sus estudios y cambiar a otro negocio mas rentable.
texts.en:
Antonia is a member of the collective Banco Comunal Alianza. She is 47 years old and lives with her partner and two children. Her business entails traveling to Lima to buy eggs, toilet paper and other products in demand, which she sells in her city of Ayacucho. Antonia needs a 1200 soles loan, which she will use to buy toilet paper. Her dreams include having her own business, her son completing his studies, and switching to a more profitable business.

Translated from Spanish by Pamela Carreón, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy toilet paper (as merchandise)

loans.name: Vicenta

texts.es:
Vicenta es socia del Banco Comunal Alianza
Vicenta es casada, tiene 43 años y 3 hijos, Vicenta tiene una imprenta llamada Señor de Arequipa, en un local alquilado ubicado en el centro de la ciudad de Ayacucho, además brinda servicio de fotocopiado, enjicados y venta de útiles de escritorio.
Vicenta necesita un préstamo de 1000 soles dinero que será invertido en la compra de toner y tinta.
Los sueños de Vicenta son aumentar su negocio, que sus hijos estudien en buenos colegios
texts.en:
Vicenta is a member of the collective Banco Comunal Alianza. She is 43-years-old, married, and has three children. Vicenta runs a print shop called Señor de Arequipa, which she runs from a rented locale in the town center of Ayacucho. Her services include photocopying and laminating as well as the sale of office supplies. Vicenta needs a loan of 1000 soles, which she will use to buy toner and ink. Vicenta’s dreams include expanding her business and sending her children to good schools.

Translated from Spanish by Pamela Carreón, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy toner and ink.

loans.name: Severo

texts.es:
Severo es pequeño agricultor y productor de leche de vaca con que elabora quesos por cantidad para la comercialización de los mismo en las ferias populares de la ciudad de La Paz; es su principal fuente de ingreso con la que cubre la manutención de sus seis hijos que esta en edad escolar; tiene su casa propia ubicado en la Provincia Ingavi – Achica Baja (a dos horas y media de la ciudad de El Alto). 

El crédito lo destinará a la compra de una vaca lechera de mediana calidad lo cual le  ayudará para incrementar la producción de quesos y mejorar sus ingresos.
 
Es el cuarto  crédito con Impro, el buen comportamiento de pago permite aprobarlo otro préstamo solicitado por el prestatario.
texts.en:
Severo is a small farmer and milk producer who produces cheese in bulk to sell at the popular markets in the city of La Paz. This is his main source of income for raising his six school-aged children. He owns his own home in the Ingavi Province - Achica Baja (two and a half hours from the city of El Alto). This loan will allow him to buy a milking cow of medium quality with which he will increase cheese production and improve his income. This is his fourth loan with Impro; his previous loan history serves to qualify him for another loan with this company.

Translated from Spanish by Pamela Carreón, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy a milking cow to increase cheese production.

loans.name: Vilma

texts.es:
Vilma es socia del Banco Comunal Alianza
Vilma es casada, tiene 40 años y 1 hija, Vilma y hermanos integran una asociación propietaria de un Colegio llamado Raúl P. en el que se imparte el nivel primario, secundario y el no escolarizado, Vilma es la directora administrativa del Colegio. Vilma tiene proyectado tener un colegio de su propiedad.
Vilma necesita un préstamo de 3500 soles dinero que será invertido en la compra de buzos y uniformes.
Los sueños de Vilma son tener un colegio de su propiedad y construir su casa.
texts.en:
Vilma is a member of the collective Banco Comunal Alianza. She is 40 years old, married, and has one daughter. Vilma and her siblings run a school association called Raúl P., which teaches K-12 grades as well as non-graded studies. Vilma is the administrative director of the school. Vilma needs a loan of 3500 soles to buy sweatshirts and uniforms. Vilma's dreams include having her own school and building her own home.

Translated from Spanish by Pamela Carreón, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy sweatshirts and uniforms.

loans.name: Gabriela

texts.es:
Gabriela tiene 16 años de edad, desde muy temprana edad tuvo que trabajar y dejar de estudiar para poder cubrir sus gastos ya que su padre la abandonó; ahora es artesana y confecciona guantes de lana de alpaca y oveja que son vendidos a una mayorista para su posterior comercialización a Europa.
Gabriela vive con su madre y sus pequeños hermanitos en una casa ubicada en la zona Villa Progreso – Rio Seco de la ciudad de El Alto.

El crédito lo destinará a la compra de materia prima, lana de oveja y alpaca, en mayores cantidades lo cual le ayudará a producir mayor cantidad de su producto.

Es el primer  crédito con Impro, la calificación realizada permite aprobarle el préstamo solicitado.
texts.en:
Gabriela is 16 years old; she has had to work since she was very young when she quit school in order to cover household expenses when her father abandoned her family. Now she works as an artisan making gloves from alpaca and sheep wool, which are sold in Europe by a wholesaler. Gabriela lives with her mother and young siblings in a house located in the Villa Progreso Zone - Rio Seco in the city of El Alto. The loan will be used to buy raw materials in bulk, such as sheep and alpaca wool, which will allow her to produce a greater quantity of product. This is her first loan with Impro and her achievements to date make her eligible for approval of this loan.

Translated from Spanish by Pamela Carreón, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy sheep and alpaca wool to make gloves.

loans.name: Antonia

texts.es:
Antonia es socia del Banco Comunal Muchuy Huaraqac que significa abundancia en quechua.
Antonia es casada, tiene 62 años, Antonia viaja a las ferias en donD. compra ganado que luego venD. en la feria D. San Juan, en algunas oportunidades mata los animales y los comercializa D. casa en casa. Además Antonia se dedica al engorD. D. ganado.
Antonia necesita un préstamo D. 1200 soles dinero que será invertido en la compra D. ganado para engorD..
Los sueños D. Antonia son mejorar su negocio y ahorrar para el futuro.
texts.en:
Antonia is a member of the collective Banco Comunal Muchuy Huaraqac, which means "abundance" in Quechua. She is 62 years old and married. Antonia travels to markets where she purchases livestock to sell at the San Juan Market. Sometimes she slaughters the animals and sells the meat door-to-door. She also fattens livestock. Antonia needs a loan of 1200 soles to invest in livestock for fattening. Her dreams incluD. improving her business and saving for the future.

Translated from Spanish by Pamela Carreón, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To invest in livestock for fattening up.

loans.name: Gladys Flavia

texts.es:
Gladys es socia del Banco Comunal Muchuy Huaraqac que significa abundancia en quechua.
Gladys es viuda, tiene 48 años y 3 hijos, Gladys tiene una tienda en casa de sus suegros en donde vende abarrotes en  general, bebidas, actividad que realiza con la ayuda de sus hijas, también vende comida todos los días.
Gladys necesita un préstamo de 1200 soles dinero que será invertido en la compra de arroz, azúcar y aceite.
Los sueños de Gladys son ahorrar para comprar su terreno y construir su casa, sus hijos sena profesionales.
texts.en:
Gladys is a member of the communal bank "Muchuy Huaraqac", which means "abundance" in Quechua. Gladys is a 48-year-old widow and has three children. Gladys has a store in the home of her in-laws, where she sells groceries and beverages with the help of her daughters. She also sells food every day. Gladys needs a loan of 1200 soles to buy rice, sugar and oil. Gladys dreams of saving money to buy land and build a house, and of her children becoming professionals.

Translated from Spanish by Trisha Bury, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase rice, sugar and oil

loans.name: Juan Manuel

texts.es:
El señor Juan Manuel vive con su esposa y dos hijos en un terreno construido en la ciudad de Nava Coahuila que su mama la señora Xochitl G. les regalo.
El trabaja en una empresa en el área de chofer de maquinaria con una antigüedad de 2 años.
Son una familia establecida en su casita, pero la familia esta creciendo y cada día requieren de mas espacio; por esta razón es que están solicitando este crédito para la construcción de un cuarto y así ir dándole a la familia una mayor comodidad.
texts.en:
Juan Manuel lives with his wife and two children on land his mother, Xochitl G., gave them in the city of Nava Coahuila. He has worked for a local company as a machine operator for two years. As a family, they are very vested in their home, but the family is growing and every day they need more space. For this reason, he is seeking a loan to build a new room and give his family more comfort.

Translated from Spanish by Trisha Bury, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Build a room at the rear of home

loans.name: Mary

texts.en: Mary is 44 years old and she has 4 children. She sells sarongs and laces and she has been in this business for a long time. She hopes for a loan of N70,000 to purchase more sarongs and laces to sell. She is, indeed, grateful to all Kiva lenders for their financial support.

loans.use: To purchase more sarongs and laces to sell

loans.name: Renee

texts.es:
Renee es socia del Banco Comunal Orquídeas
Renee es conviviente, tiene 28 años y 3 hijos, Renee junto a su esposo tienen un restaurante chifa en un local alquilado, su esposo es quien cocina y cuentan con la ayuda de 1 personal, actividad que realizan todos los días.
Renee necesita un préstamo de 900 soles dinero que será invertido en la compra de arroz, azúcar y huevo.
Los sueños de Renee son trabajar para ampliar su negocio y construir su casa.
texts.en:
Renee is a member of the Orquídeas communal bank. Renee has a live-in partner, is 28 years old, and has three children. Renee and her spouse have a Chinese-Peruvian fusion restaurant in a rented building. Her husband does the cooking and they have one other employee; they work every day. Renee needs a loan of 900 soles to purchase rice, sugar and eggs. Renee dreams of working to expand her business and building a house.

Translated from Spanish by Trisha Bury, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase rice, sugar and eggs

loans.name: Natalio

texts.es:
Natalio, vive en la Calle Juan Manuel Caceres de la zona Alto San Pedro en la ciudad de La Paz.
 
Vive  en la casa propia, junto a su esposa y sus hijos los cuales se encuentran en edad escolar.
 
Se dedica al auto transporte, trabaja como chofer propietario en la linea del trufi   N. 5 el cual recorre el centro de la ciudad. 

El crédito lo destinará a la compra de  motor y realizar otras reparaciones a su movilidad.
 
Es el primer  crédito con Impro, la evaluación realizada lo califica para otorgar el crédito.
texts.en:
Natalio lives on Juan Manuel Caceres Street in the upper San Pedro area of La Paz. He lives in his own house with his wive and school-age children. He works as a self-employed taxi driver on the number 5 Trufi line which runs down the center of the city. This loan will be used for the purchase of a motor and for other repairs as well. This is his first loan with Impro, but his evaluation determined that he is a qualified candidate.

Translated from Spanish by Cyrus Maher, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Automobile repair

loans.name: Nancy

texts.es:
Nancy es socia del Banco Comunal Orquídeas.
Nancy es conviviente y tiene 33 años, Nancy tiene un puesto en el mercado Mariscal Cáceres en donde vende abarrotes. Además viaja a las ferias de la región en donde vende abarrotes y de las ferias compra cereales, queso que vende en el mercado.
Nancy necesita un préstamo de 1050 soles dinero que será invertido en la compra de cebada, arveja, trigo.
Los sueños de Nancy son mejorar su negocio, tener una tienda y construir su casa.
texts.en:
Nancy is a member of the Orquideas Community Bank. She is a friendly and fun-loving 33 years old, and has a spot in the Mariscal Caceres market where she sells groceries. In addition, she travels to fairs in the region where she vends her groceries and buys grains and cheese which she resells when she returns to her home market. Nancy needs a loan on 1050 Sols, which she will invest in the purchase of barley, peas, and wheat. Nancy's dreams are to improve her business, open a store, and build her own house.

Translated from Spanish by Cyrus Maher, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase of barley, peas, and wheat

loans.name: Juan

texts.es:
Juan se dedica a la cría de ganado vacuno, cuya producción de leche la comercializa a PIL Andina (Planta Industrializadota de Leche). Además trabaja como transportista de ganado porcino desde su comunidad a la ciudad de El Alto.
 
Vive. en la comunidad Kallutaca  Provincia Los Andes del departamento de La Paz ubicado  a dos horas de la ciudad de La Paz.

Vive junto a su esposa quien le colabora en los quehaceres del ganado y su hogar que consta de 1 hijos. 
 
El crédito lo destinará a  la compra de una vaca lechera  de raza mejorada y así incrementar  la producción de leche, por lo tanto sus ingresos.
 
Es el primer crédito con Impro, la evaluación realizada le califica para otorgarle el préstamo
texts.en:
Juan works raising cattle, whose milk he sells to PIL Andina (Industrialized Milk Plant). He also works transporting pigs from his community to the city of El Alto. He lives in the Kallutaca community, in the Los Andes province, department of La Paz, located two hours from the city of La Paz. He lives with his wife, with whom he has one child, and together they collaborate in the necessary duties for the cattle. This loan will be used to buy a milk cow of a better breed so he can increase milk production and increase his income. This is his first loan with Kiva partner Impro, and his credit evaluation has qualified him to take out this loan.

Translated from Spanish by Laura Westin, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Buy a milk cow to increase milk production

loans.name: Honorata Yolanda

texts.es:
Yolanda es socia del Banco Comunal Orquídeas.
Yolanda es casada, tiene 40 años y 3 hijos, Yolanda elabora panes típicos de la región, tiene un horno de leña, actividad que realiza con la ayuda de empleados, sus ventas los realiza a las tiendas.
Yolanda necesita un préstamo de 1050 soles dinero que será invertido en la compra de harina y azúcar.
Los sueños de Yolanda es construir su casa de material noble, tener mas capital y comprar una mototaxi.
texts.en:
Yolanda is a member of the Orchids Communal Bank. Yolanda is married, 40 years old, and has three children. She makes traditional breads from her region using a wood-fired oven. She makes the breads with the help of her employees, and then sells them in local stores. Yolanda needs a loan of 1,050 soles which she will invest in the purchase of flour and sugar. Yolanda dreams of building a house of high-quality materials, having more capital, and buying a mototaxi.

Translated from Spanish by Laura Westin, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Buy flour and sugar

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Buy shoes and beauty products

loans.name: Vallecito Group

texts.es:
Los socios del banco comunal “VALLECITO”; son un total D. 11 miembros, ellos son D. diferentes provincias D. la ciudad, y actualmente son vecinos del distrito D. San Sebastián, ubicado a 25 minutos D. la misma ciudad del Cusco.

Nuestros socios vienen trabajando con la institución 3 años consecutivos, muchos D. ellos lograron terminar D. construir sus viviendas con estos dineros, por lo que siguen apostando en la sociedad D. su banquito; ellos tienen diferentes negocios como, tiendas abarrotes, venta D. verduras y frutas,  artesanía, carpintería, movilidad particular.

Por lo que los socios solicitan el préstamo cómo capital D. trabajo y D. este modo seguir reinvirtiendo en sus diferentes negocios, para así poder traer más prosperidad a sus vidas.

Todos los socios agradecen el esfuerzo emitido mediante este medio y valorando el préstamo se comprometen a cumplir con el pago D. sus deudas en los plazos programados.
texts.en:
There are a total of 11 members of the "Vallecito" community bank. They come from different provinces of the city and are currently residents of the San Sebastian district, located 25 minutes away from Cuzco. The group members have been working with our institution for the past three years. With this money a lot of them have been able to finish construction of their homes. They have been able to continue to count on the support of the community bank. They have various businesses such as general stores, fruit and vegetable sales, artisan products, carpentry and private transport. Our members are requesting this loan to be used as business capital. They will be able to reinvest in their businesses, bringing further prosperity to their lives. All of the group members appreciate the strength brought by these means and value this loan. They pledge to repay their loan within the scheduled repayment term.

Translated from Spanish by Cameron Morris, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Run their businesses

loans.name: Susana

texts.es:
Susana es socia del Banco Comunal Orquídeas.
Susana es soltera, tiene 37 años y 1 hijo, Susana vende verduras en un puesto del mercado Playa Grau y también vende plásticos en el mismo lugar, para lo cual cuenta con la ayuda de su hermano.
Susana necesita un préstamo de 1800 soles dinero que será invertido en la compra de bolsas y verduras.
Los sueños de Susana son que sus hijos sean profesionales, tener un negocio prospero y tener sucursales.
texts.en:
Susana is a member of the “Orquideas” Communal Bank. Susana is single, 37 years old and has 1 son. Susana sells vegetables in a stand in the Playa Grau market and she also sells plastic items in the same place. Her brother helps her with this business. Susana needs a loan for 1800 soles to invest in buying bags and vegetables. Susana dreams that her children will become professionals and of having a prosperous business with multiple locations.

Translated from Spanish by Cindy Kendall, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Buy bags and vegetables

loans.name: Celia Graciela

texts.es:
Celia es socia del Banco Comunal Orquídeas.
Celia es separada, tiene 41 años y 3 hijos, Celia tiene un bar restaurante en  un local alquilado en donde vende comida, actividad que realiza todos los días con la ayuda de sus hijos.
Celia necesita un préstamo de 750 soles dinero que será invertido en la compra de arroz, azúcar.
Los sueños de Celia son que sus hijos sean profesionales y aumentar sus negocios.
texts.en:
Celia is a member of the “Orquideas” Communal Bank. Celia is separated, 41 years old and has 3 children. Celia has a restaurant in a rented space where she sells meals, something she has done every day with her children’s help. Celia needs a loan for 750 soles to invest in buying rice and sugar. Celia dreams that her children will become professionals and of growing her businesses.

Translated from Spanish by Cindy Kendall, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Buy rice and sugar

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy more merchandise.

loans.name: Theresa

texts.en: Theresa S. is single and has two children. She has received an education through junior high school. Since 2002, she has sold groceries at Broynbima near Elmina. Theresa uses her income to pay for her family’s electric bill and the children’s school fees. Theresa will use the loan to purchase bags of rice, boxes of tomatoes, and oil. With the new profits from her expanded business, Theresa plans to reinvest in her enterprise.

loans.use: Theresa will use the loan to purchase bags of rice, boxes of tomatoes, and oil.

loans.name: Mercedes

texts.es:
Mercedes es socia del Banco Comunal Orquídeas.
Mercedes es conviviente, tiene 26 años y 1 hijo, Mercedes vende golosinas en la puerta de una empresa de transportes, para lo cual cuenta con un triciclo, actividad que realiza todos los días.
Mercedes necesita un préstamo de 600 soles dinero que será invertido en la compra de galletas y gaseosas.
Los sueños de Mercedes son mejorar sus negocios, ahorrar para sacar adelante a sus hijos y brindarles lo mejor.
texts.en:
Mercedes is a member of the communal bank Orquídeas. She lives with her partner, is 26 years old, and has a son. Everyday Mercedes sells sweets in the doorway of a transportation business, which is why she has the use of a tricycle. Mercedes needs a loan of 600 soles that she will invest in the purchase of cookies and soft drinks. Mercedes dreams of improving her business and saving so she can help her kids get ahead and give them the best.

Translated from Spanish by Shelly Hubman, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Mercedes necesita un préstamo de 600 soles dinero que será invertido en la compra de galletas y gaseosas.

loans.name: Francisco

texts.es:
Francisco es pequeño agricultor y productor de leche  de vaca que  comercializa a PIL ANDINA, Empresa que acopia para su posterior transformación en derivados como ser yogurt, dulce de leche, queso y otros ; es su principal fuente de ingreso con lo que cubre la manutención de sus cuatro hijos que están estudiando en el colegio estatal del pueblo; tiene su casa propia ubicado en la Provincia Los Andes Huayrocondo - Batallas(a dos horas de la ciudad de El Alto). 

El crédito lo destinara para la compra de una vaca lechera de mediana calidad misma que le ayudará a la mayor producción de leche de vaca y su venta a Pil Andina para mejorar sus ingresos.
 
Es el tercer  crédito con Impro, el buen comportamiento de pago permite aprobarle este préstamo solicitado.
texts.en:
Francisco is a small farmer and cow milk producer who sells his goods to Pil Andina, a company that stock-piles food to then create by-products such as yogurt, milk candy, cheese, and others. This is his main form of income that covers the maintenance of his four children who study at the public school in town. He has his own house located in the province of Los Andes Huayrocondo - Batallas (two hours from the city of El Alto). The loan will be used to purchase a medium quality dairy cow that will help him with greater milk production and his sales to Pil Andina will increase his income. This is the third loan con Kiva partner Impro, and the good repayment terms allow him to be approved for this loan.

Translated from Spanish by Josh Wilcox, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase of a dairy cow to increase milk production.

loans.name: Victoria

texts.es:
Victoria es socia del Banco Comunal Villa Huatatas.
Victoria es viuda, tiene 41 años y 6 hijos, Victoria se dedica a la venta D. cereales, viaja semanalmente a la costa a la ciudad D. cañete y D. allá compra frutas que venD. en el mercado D. abastos D. la ciudad D. Ayacucho.
Victoria necesita un préstamo D. 1500 soles dinero que será invertido en la compra D. papa seca, cebada, haba.
Los sueños D. Victoria son ahorrar para comprar su casa y su hija ultima culmine sus estudios.
texts.en:
Victoria is a member of the communal bank “Villa Huatatas.” She is a widow, 41 years old, and has 6 children. Victoria sells cereals for a living. Every week she travels to the coast, to the city Cañete, where she buys fruits that she sells in the wholesale food market in the city of Ayacucho. Victoria needs a loan of 1500 soles to invest in the purchase of dried potatoes, barely, and beans. Victoria dreams of saving so she can buy a house and help her youngest daughter finish her studies.

Translated from Spanish by Shelly Hubman, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Victoria necesita un préstamo de 1500 soles dinero que será invertido en la compra de papa seca, cebada, haba.

loans.name: Regina

texts.en:
Since 1994, Regina M. has worked as a fishmonger and trader, selling fish and minerals in Elmina. She is married and has nine dependents. She has received an education through junior high school.

While Regina works as a trader, her husband is employed as a fisherman. She is responsible for paying for her family’s various expenses, including school fees and bills. Her loan will be used to buy more fish and minerals to sell. She hopes to save the new profits from her business and to build a home for her family.

loans.use: Her loan will be used to buy more fish

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: William needs a loan of 1500 soles, which he'll invest in rooster feed and tournament registration fees.

loans.name: Sofia

texts.es:
Sofia es socia del Banco Comunal Villa Huatatas.
Sofia es casada, tiene 35 años y 2 hijos, Sofia junto a su esposo tienen carros con los cuales realizan transporte publico a diferentes distritos de la provincia, su esposo conduce uno de los carros.
Sofia necesita un préstamo de 900 soles dinero que será invertido en la compra de neumáticos para carros.
Los sueños de Sofia son comprar otro carro y sacar adelante a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Sofia is a partner of the Villa Hatatas community bank. She is 35 years old and married, with two children. Sofia and her husband own cars, which they use for their public transportation business. Her husband drives one of the cars. Sofia needs a loan of 900 soles which she'll invest in car tires. She dreams of buying another car and helping her children get ahead.

Translated from Spanish by Sarah Bishop, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Sofia needs a loan of 900 soles, which she'll invest in car tires.

loans.name: Marina

texts.es:
Marina es socia del Banco Comunal Villa Huatatas.
Marina es casada, tiene 40 años y 3 hijos, Marina vende leña en su casa, actividad que realiza con ayuda de sus hijos, además Marina vende comida de manera ambulatoria en un paradero de trasporte publico.
Marina necesita un préstamo de 900 soles dinero que será invertido en la compra de leña.
Los sueños de Marina son que sus hijos sean profesionales y mejorar su negocio.
texts.en:
Marina is a partner in the Villa Huatatas community bank. She is 40 years old and married, with three children. Marina sells firewood from her home, with the help of her children. She also sells food in a public transportation hub. Marina needs a loan of 900 soles, which she'll invest in wood. She dreams of her children becoming professionals and of improving her business.

Translated from Spanish by Sarah Bishop, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Marina needs a loan of 900 soles, which she'll invest in firewood.

loans.name: Mery

texts.es:
Mery es socia del Banco Comunal Villa Huatatas.
Mery es casada, tiene 39 años y 5 hijos, Mery junto a su esposo tienen 2 carros con los cuales realizan transporte publico a diferentes distritos de la región, además Mery siembra papa, quinua que luego vende en el mercado de abastos de la ciudad de Ayacucho.
Mery necesita un préstamo de 900 soles dinero que será invertido en la compra de repuestos y mantenimiento de carro.
Los sueños de Mery son educar a sus hijos y comprar otro carro.
texts.en:
Mery is a partner in the Villa Huatatas community bank. She is 39 years old and married, with five children. Mery and her husband have two cars, which they employ in a public transport business that serves several districts in the region. Mery also grows potatoes and quinua, which she sells in the food market of Ayacucho. Mery needs a loan of 900 soles, which she'll invest in spare parts and maintenance for her car. She dreams of educating her children and buying another car.

Translated from Spanish by Sarah Bishop, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Mery needs a loan of 900 soles, which she'll invest in spare parts and maintenence for her car.

loans.name: Monica

texts.en:
Monica B. is married and five dependents. She has received an education through primary school. Since 1989, Monica has worked as a trader selling maize, food, and groceries in Elmina. While Monica works as a trader, her husband is employed as a teacher.

Monica uses her income to pay for her children’s school fees. Monica will use this loan to purchase more food and other groceries to sell. With the new profits from her expanded business, Monica plans to build a house.

loans.use: Monica will use the loan to purchase more food and other groceries to sell

loans.name: Dominga

texts.es:
La socia es la Sra.: DOMINGA, ella es natural de la provincia del Cusco del distrito de Ollantaytambo ubicado a 1:30 minutos de la ciudad en transporte público.

Nuestra socia tiene 39 años de edad y tiene 3 hijos de (21, 18, 14) años, ella alterna sus actividades del hogar con el comercio minorista, ella tiene una carreta de venta de golosinas la cuál la surtió con poco de artesanía y se ubica cerca de la puerta de la estación principal de trenes con dirección a la ciudadela inka de Machupicchu. Cada madrugada ella lleva su carreta desde su casa hasta la estación para lograr un espacio y así comenzar su venta diaria, se queda hasta las 10 p.m. que terminan de retornar los trenes y es cuando ella termina su día. La socia requiere el préstamo en razón de que necesita implementar con artesanía variada su carreta y comprar botellas de aguas minerales.

Ella está muy agradecida con el préstamo otorgado y valora el apoyo que ustedes le brindan mediante este medio, así mismo ella se compromete a cumplir con el pago de su deuda en el plazo determinado.
texts.en:
Dominga is from Cusco, in the Ollantaytambo district, which is an hour and a half from the city. Dominga is 39 years old and has three children (ages 21, 18, and 14). She supplements her work at home with a small business selling candy and handicrafts. She is stationed near the door of the main train station that offers service to the Incan city of Machupicchu. Each morning Dominga wakes up early to wheel her cart to the train station to make sure that she secures a space. She sells all day, staying at the station until 10pm, when the trains return. Dominga needs a loan to repair her cart and buy bottled mineral water. Dominga thanks you in advance for the loan and values the support that it offers. She promises to repay the loan on time.

Translated from Spanish by Sarah Bishop, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Set up her cart to sell sweets and handicrafts.

loans.name: Nieves Dina

texts.es:
Nieves es socia del Banco Comunal Virgen Maria.
Nieves es viuda, tiene 55 años y 3 hijos, Nieves tiene un restaurante en su casa llamado Kayllapiña que significa Aquí Nada Más en quechua, actividad que realiza con la ayuda de 3 empleados, además los días sábados y domingos vende comida típica.
Nieves necesita un préstamo de 3000 soles dinero que será invertido en la compra de cerveza, cuy, gallina.
Los sueños de Nieves son ampliar su negocio, mejorar su local y que sus hijos últimos culminen sus profesiones.
texts.en:
Nieves is a partner in the Virgen Maria community bank. She is 55 years old and a widow, with three children. Nives has a restaurant in her home, called Kayllapiña, which means "Here No More" in quechua. Nives manages the restaurant with the help of three employees, and on the weekends she sells traditional food. Nives needs a loan of 3000 soles, which she'll invest in beer, guinea pig, and chicken. She dreams of expanding the business, improving the property, and seeing her children become professionals.

Translated from Spanish by Sarah Bishop, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Nieves needs a loan of 3000 soles, which she'll invest in beer, guinea pig, and chicken.

loans.name: Lidia

texts.es:
Lidia es socia del Banco Comunal Virgen Maria.
Lidia es casada, tiene 36 años y 5 hijos, Lidia viaja a las ferias de la región en donde compra cereales, papa, queso, animales menores, productos que vende en el  mercado nery garcía y también de casa en casa. Lidia también se dedica al engorde de ganado.
Lidia necesita un préstamo de 1600 soles dinero que será invertido en la compra de cereales y ganado vacuno para engorde.
Los sueños de Lidia son mejorar su casa para la comodidad de sus hijos y ampliar su establo de engorde de ganado.
texts.en:
Lidia is a partner in the Virgen Mary community bank. She is 36 years old and married, with five children. Lidia travels to the regional markets, where she buys grains, potatoes, cheese, and small animals. She then re-sells these products in the nery garcía market, as well as house-to-house. Lidia also raises livestock. Lidia needs a loan of 1600 soles, which she'll invest in grains and vaccines for livestock. She dreams of improving her home to make her children more comfortable, and expanding her stable.

Translated from Spanish by Sarah Bishop, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Lidia needs a loan of 1600 soles, which she'll invest in grains and vaccines for livestock.

loans.name: Lucy

texts.es:
Lucy es socia del Banco Comunal Virgen Maria.
Lucy es soltera, tiene 22 años y vive con padres, Lucy viaja a las ferias de la region en donde compra cereales, papa, queso, animales menores, productos que vende en la feria de San Juan y también de casa en casa.
Lucy necesita un préstamo de 1600 soles dinero que será invertido en la compra de ganado vacuno.
Los sueños de Lucy es comprar un establo para engordar animales y estudiar la carrera de medicina veterinaria.
texts.en:
Lucy is a member of the Virgin Mary Communal Bank. She is single, 22 years old, and lives with her parents. Lucy travels to the regional markets where she buys cereals, potatoes, cheese, and baby animals. She sells these products in the San Juan market and also door-to-door. Lucy needs a loan of 1600 soles that she will invest in the purchase of cattle. Lucy's dream is to purchase a stable for fattening animals and to study veterinary medicine.

Translated from Spanish by Leah Karlins, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To purchase cattle

loans.name: Aba

texts.en: Since 1984, Aba M. has worked as a trader in Elmina selling food. She is married and has three children. She has received no formal education. While Aba works as a trader, her husband is employed as a farmer. She is responsible for occasionally paying for her children’s school fees. Her loan will be used to buy red oil, tomatoes, garden eggs (eggplant), and onions. She hopes to use the new profits from her business to reinvest in her enterprise.

loans.use: Her loan will be used to buy red oil, tomatoes, garden eggs (eggplant) and onions.

loans.name: Lucinda Emilia

texts.es:
Emilia es socia del Banco Comunal Virgen Maria.
Emilia es casada, tiene 40 años y 3 hijos, Emilia tiene una tienda en su casa en donde vende abarrotes, verduras, frutas, actividad que realiza todos los días con la ayuda de sus hijos. Además por las tardes vende salchipapas.
Emilia necesita un préstamo de 1000 soles dinero que será invertido en la compra de arroz, azúcar, leche.
Los sueños de Emilia son tener una tienda mayorista, mejorar su negocio y que sus hijos sean profesionales.
texts.en:
Emilia is a member of the Virgin Mary Communal Bank. She is married, 40 years old, and has three children. She has a stO. in her home where she sells groceries, vegetables, and fruits, a job that she does every day with the help of her children. In addition, in the afternoons she sells sausage fries. Emilia needs a loan of 1000 soles to invest in the purchase of rice, sugar, and milk. Emilia dreams of having a wholesale stO., improving her business and for her children to become professionals.

Translated from Spanish by Leah Karlins, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To purchase rice, sugar, and milk

loans.name: Vivian

texts.en: Since 1989 Vivian F. has worked as a trader selling tomatoes and garden eggs in Elmina. She is married with five dependents and has received no formal education. While Vivian makes her living as a trader, her husband is a worker at UCC. She is responsible for contributing housekeeping money for the family. Her loan will be used to buy more foodstuffs for selling and she hopes to use the new profits from her business to help educate her children.

loans.use: To buy more foodstuffs for selling

loans.name: Nilda

texts.es:
Nuestra socia es la Sra. NILDA; ella es natural del distrito de Ollantaytambo, situado a 1:40 minutos desde la ciudad del Cusco en transporte público.

La socia tiene 33 años de edad y tiene 5 hijos de (15, 10, 8, 5, 4) años, nuestra socia es madre soltera y trabaja mucho para poder sacar adelante a sus hijos que aún dependen de ella, ella tiene un pequeño puesto o tienda de venta de desayunos en el mercado central del distrito de Ollantaytambo, da el servicio de desayunos, en base a jugos y diferentes bebida calientes, también ofrece el desayuno cuzqueño que trae (un plato de comida seco, un par de panes de la región y una bebida fría o caliente, café, té, leche, mates, jugos), ofrece sándwich de diferentes carnes, pasteles, leches y ponches, ella solicita el préstamo para poder implementar mejor su negocio y comprar más insumos.

La socia valora y agradece el apoyo brindado mediante este medio y así mismo se compromete a cumplir con el pago de su préstamo.
texts.en:
Nilda is from the district of Ollanyatambo, which is an hour and forty minutes from the city of Cusco on public transportation. Nilda is 33 years old and has five children who are 15, 10, 8, 5, and 4 years old. She is a single mother and she works very hard to create a life for her children, who still depend on her. She has a small breakfast stand in the central market of Ollanyatambo district where she provides a breakfast service of juices and different hot drinks. She also offers a Cuzco breakfast that includes a plate of dried fruits, a couple of local breads, and a cold or hot drink (coffee, tea, milk, mate, or juice). She also sells different kinds of meat sandwiches, pastries, milk, and punches. Nilda seeks a loan so that she can improve her business and purchase more supplies. She values and appreciates the support offered through this channel and she also promises to repay her loan on time.

Translated from Spanish by Leah Karlins, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To purchase ingredients for her breakfast stand

loans.name: Adan Renan

texts.es:
Adan es socio del Banco Comunal Virgen Maria.
Adan es casado, tiene 28 años y 2 hijos, Adan junto a su esposa tienen un bar restaurante llamado Characato, en donde vende platos extras como cebiche, cuenta con la ayuda de dos empleados, además Adan vende golosinas.
Adan necesita un préstamo de 1000 soles dinero que será invertido en la compra de cerveza y gaseosa.
Los sueños de Adan son ampliar su negocio, tener mas sucursales y que sus hijos sean profesionales.
texts.en:
Adan is a member of the Virgen Mary Communal Bank. He is married, 28 years old, and has two children. Adan and his wife have a restaurant-bar called Characato, where they sell unique dishes such as ceviche. They employ two workers, and Adan also sells sweets. Adan needs a loan of 1000 soles that he will invest in the purchase of beer and soft drinks. He dreams of expanding his business, adding more locations, and that his children can become professionals.

Translated from Spanish by Leah Karlins, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To purchase soft drinks and beer

loans.name: Nancy

texts.es:
Nancy es socia del Banco Comunal Virgen Maria.
Nancy es conviviente, tiene 24 años y 1 hija, Nancy vende repuestos de carros en un local alquilado, en donde también su esposo tiene un taller de mecánica de carros y tiene el apoyo de dos ayudantes.
Nancy necesita un préstamo de 2000 soles dinero que será invertido en la compra de repuestos, luces y cables.
Los sueños de Nancy son comprar terreno para la construcción de su casa, mejorar su casa, tener un carro propio para salir a pasear y brindar una buena educación a su hija.
texts.en:
Nancy is a member of the Virgin Mary Communal Bank. She lives with her common-law husband, is 24 years old, and has one daughter. Nancy sells spare car parts in a rented space, where her husband has a car mechanic workshop and employs two assistants. Nancy needs a loan of 2000 soles to invest in the purchase of car parts, lights, and cables. Nancy's dreams are to purchase land for the construction of her home, to have her own car to drive around in, and to provide a good education for her daughter.

Translated from Spanish by Leah Karlins, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To purchase car parts, lights, and cables

loans.name: Mamadou

texts.fr: MAMADOU S. EST NE LE 13 MAI 1988 A THIES .IL EST CELIBATAIRE ET HABITE AU QUARTIER MEDINA FALL DE THIES.IL GERE UNE CANTINE AU MARCHE CENTRAL ET Y VEND DES ACCESSOIRES DE PORTABLES.AVEC CE PRET ,il veut renforcer sa boutique en s'approvisionnant à dakar .
texts.en:
Mamadou S. was born on May 13, 1988 in THIES. He is unmarried and lives in the Medina Fall district of THIES. He runs a stall at the central market. There, he sells mobile phone accessories. With this loan, he wants to bolster his shop by acquiring supplies in Dakar.

Translated from French by Dan Kuey, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy accesspores for cell phones

loans.name: Francisca

texts.es:
La socia FRANCISCA, nació y vivió toda su vida en el distrito D. Ollantaytambo en la provincia del Cusco, ubicado a 1:40 minutos D. la misma ciudad.

Nuestra socia es casada, tienen 57 años D. edad, tiene 4 hijos todos ellos mayores y con sus respectivas familias, ella ahora está solicitando el préstamo para poder ayudar a su hija Maritza a implementar su negocio en el mercado central D. venta D. desayunos y almuerzos, ella quiere apoyar a su hija que es madre soltera y ambas vender sus comidas en el mercado central, para lo que nuestra socia requiere el préstamo.

La socia Francisca está muy agradecida con el apoyo otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con el pago D. su préstamo en el plazo programado.
texts.en:
Francisca has lived her whole life in the district of Ollantaytambo in the province of Cusco, located 1 hour and 40 minutes from the city of Cusco. She is married, 57 years old, and has four children who are all grown and have their own families. She is requesting a loan so that she can help her daughter Maritza to run her breakfast/brunch business in the central market. She wants to support her daughter, who is a single mother, by selling food together with her in the central market. She requests a loan to enable her to do that. Francisca is very grateful for the support offered and she promises to repay her loan on schedule.

Translated from Spanish by Leah Karlins, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To invest in her daughter's breakfast/brunch stand

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To invest in marketing and security equipment

loans.name: Abdou Samad

texts.fr: MR ABDOU SAMAD N. EST UN JEUNE COIFFEUR QUI HABITE AU QUARTIER MEDINA FALL DE THIES.IL EXERCE CE METIER DEPUIS TROIS ANS .AVEC CE PRET ,il veut acheter du matériel pour équiper son salon de coiffure,ce qui  va l'aider à satisfaire sa clientèle composé des jeunes du quartier .
texts.en:
Mr. Abdou Samad N. is a young hair stylist who lives in the Medina Fall district of Thiès. He has been working at this trade for three years. He wants to buy tools and supplies to equip his hair salon. This will help him to satisfy his customers, who are composed of young people in his area.

Translated from French by Dan Kuey, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To equip his salon

loans.name: Mariza

texts.es:
La socia MARIZA; nació y vivió en el distrito de Ollantaytambo del departamento del Cusco, ubicado a una hora y cuarenta minutos de la ciudad del Cusco.

Ella tiene 36 años de edad y tiene 2 menores hijos de (13, 3) años de edad, de estado civil casada es madre sola, ya que ella trabaja mucho para poder sacar adelante a sus hijos con su educación y su alimentación. Ella alternas sus actividades del hogar con el comercio minorista, teniendo un pequeño puesto en el mercado central junto con su madre, ellas venden desayunos, almuerzos y refrescos, por ello solicita el préstamo para poder reinvertir en su pequeño negocio y así seguir cubriendo satisfactoriamente los gastos de su hogar y de sus otras necesidades.

La socia agradece el préstamo otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con el pago total de su deuda en el tiempo establecido.
texts.en:
Mariza was born and raised in the district of Ollantaytambo, Cusco, which is less than two hours from the city of Cusco. Mariza is 36 years old and has two young children (age 13 and 3) from a previous marriage. As a single mother, she works a great deal to provide her kids with everything they need, including food and money for their education. Mariza divides her time between her household chores and a small business that she runs with her mother. They operate a food stand in a central market, where they sell breakfast, lunch and drinks. Mariza has asked for a loan so that she can re-invest in her business and keep up with her household expenses, too. She appreciates this loan and has agreed to make all of her payments on time.

Translated from Spanish by Corinne Gilroy, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Working capital

loans.name: Gumercinda

texts.es:
La Sra. GUMERCINDA, es natural del distrito de Ollantaytambo ubicado en pleno corazón del valle sagrado de los inkas, esta a 1 hora y 40 minutos de la ciudad del Cusco.

Nuestra socia tiene 45 años de edad, es casada y tiene 5 hijos de (25, 22, 20, 18, 16) años La socia alterna sus actividades hogareñas con el comercio minorista, ella compra y vende aves de corral, también está dedicada a la venta de semillas secas para su plantación, como son la cebada, trigo, maíz, frijoles, entre otros; Nuestra socia solicita el préstamo para así poder comprar mayor número de aves y poder tener mejor producción, ella también vende pasto en la esquina del mercado.

La socia agradece el apoyo prestado y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de su préstamo en el tiempo determinado.
texts.en:
Gumercinda is native to the district of Ollantaytambo, in the heart of the Sacred Valley of the Incas, less than two hours from the city of Cusco. Gumercinda is 45 years old, married, and has five children, age 25, 22, 20, 18 and 16. She divides her time between household work and her small business; she buys and sells chickens and dried seeds (barley, wheat, corn, beans, etc.). Gumercinda has requested a loan so that she can buy more birds, increase production and sell feed at market. She appreciates your support and agrees to comply with the terms of her loan.

Translated from Spanish by Corinne Gilroy, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Buying chickens and seeds

loans.name: Apolinar

texts.es:
El socio es el Sr. APOLINAR, el es natural de la provincia del Cusco del distrito de piñipampa, ubicado a 40 minutos de la misma ciudad.

Este socio tiene 37 años de edad, conviviente con 2 hijos y alterna sus actividades de la agricultura con la elaboración de tejas artesanales, este trabajo el lo conoce desde muy niño, debido que el ayudaba a su padre a la elaboración de tejas, el solicita el préstamo para poder comprar materia prima para elaborar las tejas de arcilla,  arena, y alquiler del horno para coser su producción y después transportarla a la ciudad del Cusco.

El socio agradece y valora el préstamo otorgado debido que esta zona no hay acceso ala banca financiera, por lo que se compromete a cumplir con el pago total de su préstamo.
texts.en:
Apolinar is native to the province of Cusco in the district of Piñipampa, which is about 40 minutes from the city. Apolinar is 37 years old, lives with his two children, and divides his time between farming and making artisan tiles. He learned to make tiles as a child, when he helped his father with the craft. Apolinar has requested a loan so that he can buy tile-making materials like clay and sand, rent ovens, and afford to transport his tiles to the city of Cusco. Apolinar appreciates this loan because there is no commercial banking available in his area. He has agreed to abide by all the terms of his loan.

Translated from Spanish by Corinne Gilroy, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Buying clay for tile-making

loans.name: Aïssatou Combé

texts.fr: Aïssatou Combé D. est âgée de 57ans, mariée et mère de 3 enfants, plus 4 neveux  dont elle a la charge. Elle souhaiterait promouvoir son activité de vente de pâte d’arachide et d’huile de palme. Son objectif est de prendre en charge ses enfants, de même ceux de sa sœur décédée dont elle a la charge.
texts.en:
Aïssatou Combé DRAM, age 57, is married and the mother of three children, plus she has four nephews in her care. She would like to advance her business selling peanut butter and palm oil. Her objective is to provide for her children, as well as for her deceased sister's children, who she is supporting.

Translated from French by Dan Kuey, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy and sell peanut butter and palm oil

loans.name: Aminata

texts.fr: Aminata B. est une femme mariée avec 05 enfants en charge. Elle veut promouvoir son commerce. Elle vend des légumes sur un étal qu’elle tient à domicile. Son objectif est d’améliorer les conditions  de vie de sa famille.
texts.en:
Aminata B. is a married woman with five children to support. She wants to advance her business. She sells vegetables in a stall that she has at home. Her goal is to improve her family's living conditions.

Translated from French by Dan Kuey, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy and sell vegetables retail at her stall

loans.name: Martha

texts.en:
Martha E. is 45 years old. She is married and has given birth to six children: one son and five daughters. She says some of her children are in the polytechnic, senior high and junior high schools. She lives with her children and husband in a rented apartment in a busy fishing/commercial town called Mankessim, near Cape Coast in the Central region of Ghana.

Martha works to support her husband financially to provide for the family. Martha’s husband is a commercial driver while she is a trader. She trades in all kinds of cereals such as maize, beans, etc. Martha procures the goods all the way from Ejura in the northern sector. She sells at the local market to food vendors and retailers. Martha has been in business for 14 years and wants a loan to procure goods in bulk. She is hopeful to give her children the best education she can afford.

loans.use: To procure cereals

loans.name: Augustina

texts.en:
Augustina E. is 42 years old. She is married and has given birth to four children: two sons and two daughters. She says her children are in the senior high and the primary schools. She lives with her children and husband in a rented apartment in a busy fishing/commercial town called Mankessim, near Cape Coast in the Central region of Ghana.

Augustina works to support her husband financially to provide for the family. Her husband is a commercial driver while she is a trader. She trades in all kinds of cereals such as maize, beans, etc. She procures the goods all the way from Ejura in the northern sector. Augustina sells at the local market to food vendors and retailers. She has been in business for eight years and wants a loan to procure goods in bulk. She is hopeful to give her children the best education she can afford.

loans.use: To procure cereals

loans.name: Adwoa

texts.en:
Adwoa K. works to help her husband provide for their family. Her husband is a fitting mechanic while she is a trader. She trades in all kinds of cereals such as maize, beans, etc. She procures the goods all the way from Ejura in the northern sector. Adwoa sells at the local market to food vendors and retailers. She has been in business for seven years and wants a loan to procure goods in bulk.

Adwoa is 34-years old. She is married and has given birth to three children: two sons and a daughter. According to Adwoa, all her children are currently in primary school. She lives with her children and husband in a rented apartment in the busy fishing/commercial town called Mankessim, near Cape Coast, in the Central region of Ghana. Adwoa is hoping to give her children the best education she can afford.

loans.use: To procure cereals

loans.name: Juliana

texts.en:
Juliana A. is 34 years old. She is married with three children – one son and two daughters – who are currently in junior high and primary schools. Juliana lives with her children and husband in a rented apartment in the busy fishing/commercial town of Mankessim, near Cape Coast, in the central region of Ghana. 

Juliana’s husband is a commercial driver and she is a trader. She works to help her husband provide for the family. She trades in tubers of yam, which she sells at the local market to food vendors and retailers. She procures the tubers all the way from Atebubu in the northern sector.

Juliana has been in business for seven years, and is requesting a loan to procure tubers in bulk. She is hoping to expand her business and give her children the best education she can afford.

loans.use: Purchase tubers of yam to resell

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.en:
Elizabeth A. is 50 years old. She is married with five children – two sons and three daughters – who are currently in senior high, junior high, and primary school. She lives with her children and husband in a rented apartment in the busy fishing/commercial town of Mankessim, near Cape Coast, in the central region of Ghana. 

Elizabeth works to help her husband provide for the family. He runs a drinking spot and Elizabeth is a trader. She sells all kinds of cereals, such as maize, groundnuts, millet, beans, etc., at the local market to food vendors and retailers.  She procures her goods all the way from Techiman in the northern sector. 

Elizabeth has been in business for almost twenty years and is well experienced. She is requesting a loan to procure cereals in bulk. She is hoping to expand her business and give her children the best education she can afford.

loans.use: To procure cereals

loans.name: Cecilia

texts.en:
Cecilia A. is 47 years old. She is married with three children – two sons and a daughter – all of whom are currently in primary school. She lives with her children and husband in a rented apartment in a busy fishing and commercial town called Mankessim, near Cape Coast, in the central region of Ghana. 

Cecilia works to help her husband provide for the family. Her husband is a commercial driver and Cecilia is a trader. She sells cereals such as maize,rice, beans, etc., at the local market to food vendors and retailers. She procures her cereals all the way from Ejura in the northern sector.

Cecilia has been in business for over eight years. She is requesting for a loan to increase her working capital to procure cereals in bulk. She is hoping to improve her income to provide a more decent life for family and also to sponsor her kids in school.

loans.use: To procure cereals

loans.name: Cecilia

texts.en:
Cecilia A. is thirty-seven years old. She is married and has three children, two sons and a daughter. According to her, all her children are currently in primary school. She lives with her children and husband in a rented apartment in a busy fishing/commercial town called Mankessim, near Cape Coast in the Central region of Ghana.

Cecilia works to support her husband financially to provide for the family. Her husband is a commercial driver while she is a trader. Cecilia trades in cereals such as maize, beans, etc. She procures the goods all the way from Ejura in the northern sector and sells at the local market to food vendors and retailers. She has been in business for over eight years and wants a loan to procure goods in bulk. She is hoping to give her children the best education she can afford.

loans.use: To buy cereals for resale

loans.name: Djita

texts.fr: Djiba D. est mariée, mère de 07 enfants. Elle s’active dans le commerce de tissus teint à l’indigo « Thioup ». Elle souhaiterait renforcer cette activité pour mieux subvenir aux besoins familiaux.
texts.en:
Djiba D. is married and the mother of 7 children. She sells indigo-dyed cloth, locally called "Thioup". She would like to bolster this little business so as to support her family better.

Translated from French by Teresa Kramer, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: purchase and re-sale of dyed cloth called "Thioup"

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy goods

loans.name: Lucía Otilia

texts.es:
En el Mercado La Terminal de la ciudad de León la señora Lucrecia P. con gran entusiasmo se dedica a comercializar ropa el cual es vendida por ella misma para llevar el sustento a su casa de habitación.

Hoy en día la razón por la cual ha acudido a Ceprodel es para  solicitar un crédito para la compra de la ropa y así proceder a comercializarla en su localidad,
texts.en:
In the Terminal Market in the city of Leon, Mrs. Lucrecia Perez puts all her energy into selling selling clothing (that she also buys herself), which helps her contribute to her household expenses. She has requested a loan from Ceprodel so that she can buy more clothing and advertise in her area.

Translated from Spanish by Corinne Gilroy, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Buying clothes

loans.name: Rosa Argentina

texts.es:
En la ciudad de León, específicamente en el Mercado La Terminal la señora Rosa B. se dedica a la venta de bebidas como lo son agua, gaseosas y jugos comercializados por ella misma en su localidad.

Es de importancia destacar que ella ha logrado salir adelante en su negocio ya que ha sido fiel cliente de Ceprodel quien le ha proporcionado créditos para su desarrollo. Hoy en día espera ser beneficiada con un nuevo crédito el cual lo ocupará para la compra de las bebidas y así continuar en su negocio que tanto requiere de su apoyo hoy en día.
texts.en:
In the city of Leon-- specifically, in the Terminal Market-- Mrs. Rosa B. is in the business of selling water, soft drinks and juices, which she advertises in her neighbourhood. Mrs. B. is very successful; she has long been a loyal Ceprodel client, and has contributed to the group's development. Now she would like the help of a loan, which will allow her to purchase more drinks and continue with her business.

Translated from Spanish by Corinne Gilroy, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Buying drinks

loans.name: Rosario

texts.es:
Rosario M. es una dama muy trabajadora y dedicada a su trabajo de venta de productos lácteos como lo son queso, cuajada y crema siendo comercializados en su localidad donde es visitado por los clientes a diario.

Es de suma importancia destacar que hoy en día ella requiere de la materia prima para la elaboración de los lácteos y por este motivo ha acudido a Ceprodel para ser beneficiada con un crédito y de esta manera salir adelante en su negocio que tanto requiere de su apoyo.
texts.en:
Rosario M. is an extremely hard-working lady. Every day she sells dairy products (cheese, curds and cream) around her neighbourhood. She needs more raw materials for making dairy products, so she has come to Ceprodel for a loan. In order to succeed, she needs your support.

Translated from Spanish by Corinne Gilroy, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Buying raw materials

loans.name: Felipa Consuelo

texts.es:
La señora Felipa R. se dedica a la venta de bisutería en el mercado la Terminal de la ciudad de León ofreciendo los productos de cosméticos, colas, aretes, entre otros siendo vendidos a diario en su localidad.

Con el propósito de mejorar su situación y salir adelante ella ha acudido a Ceprodel para ser beneficiada con un crédito para la compra de las bisuterías y de esta manera mejorar su condición económica ya que su deber es mantener a su familia.
texts.en:
Mrs. Felipa R. has dedicated herself to the business of imitation jewelry in the Terminal market in the city of Leon. She offers cosmetic products, earrings, and various items that are sold daily in the area.

With this request she will better her situation and has gone to Ceprodel to gain better credit to purchase the imitation jewelry. This will improve their economic condition as it is her duty to support her family.

Translated from Spanish by Jenson Abraham, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To purchase imitation jewelry

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy material

loans.name: Odile

texts.fr: Odile D. est mariée et mère de famille. Elle voudrait maintenir son activité de commerce de miel et de pâte d’arachide. Elle compte avec ses revenus, assurer une meilleure condition de vie à sa famille.
texts.en:
Odile D. is married and the mother of a family. She would like to keep up her business selling honey and peanut butter. She feels sure that her income can allow her to improve living conditions for her family.

Translated from French by Teresa Kramer, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: purchase and re-sale of honey and making and selling peanut butter

loans.name: Eusebia

texts.es: Eusebia tiene 48 años, es una mujer muy alegre y segura de sí misma, vive en su propia casa la cual con mucho esfuerzo logró construir, desea mejorar su vida y tener una vejez digna. El servicio que brinda Eusebia a sus clientes es de mucha utilidad para su barrio, puesto que se encuentra en el negocio de los locutorios y la mayoría de sus clientes utilizan sus teléfonos para realizar llamadas urgentes y de suma importancia. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es conversar con sus clientes y tratarlos bien, pero lo que menos le gusta es permanecer todo el día dentro de su locutorio sin poder salir a ningún lugar. Lleva 4 años en esta actividad y espera más adelante hacer crecer su negocio y tener más cabinas, las cuales le brinden un mejor ingreso económico y así pueda salir adelante. Eusebia se encuentra en su primer préstamo con MFP y está muy feliz de haberlo obtenido, por ello está dispuesta a pagar todas sus cuotas a tiempo, en su banco comunal es muy solidaria con el resto de socias. Con los 1000 soles mejorará los muebles de su locutorio, además pondrá más cabinas para atender a más clientes.
texts.en:
Eusebia is 48-years old and is a very happy and self-assured woman. She lives in her own proper house which took much effort to construct. She desires to have a better life and wants to grow old with dignity.

The service Eusebia offers her clients provides much utility for her neighborhood as it is a phone booth call center. The majority of her clients utilize her phones to make urgent calls of vital importance. The part of her job that she enjoys the most is conversing with her clients and treating them well, but what she likes least is having to be in the call center all day without a break. It’s been 4-years that she’s been at this business and she expects to expand the business with more cabins, which will bring in more profits and cause her business to succeed.

This is Eusebia’s first loan with MFP and she is very happy to obtain it and she is willing to pay it on time. Her community bank is very supportive of its members and with this 1000 soles she will improve her call center’s furniture and build out more cabins to serve more clients.

Translated from Spanish by Jenson Abraham, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Improve the furniture at her business

loans.name: Francisca

texts.es: Francisca es una mujer de 44 años, muy luchadora y persistente en sus metas, vive en la casa que le cedieron sus padres y lo que más quiere es salir adelante. Una carretilla de salchipollo (comida al paso hecha a base de pollo frito y tallarines) es la compañera diaria de Francisca, quien sale todas las noches a vender la comida que prepara, vende en la Plaza Bolognesi (plaza importante de la ciudad de Juliaca) y a partir de las 7 de la noche los clientes se dan cita para comer el delicioso salchipollo que prepara. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es cocinar para sus clientes, ya que ella se divierte mucho haciéndolo. Lleva 18 años en este negocio y lo más difícil es permanecer gran parte de la noche en la calle, soportando el intenso frió. Para el futuro anhela tener una tienda en un lugar céntrico donde pueda vender con mayor comodidad su salchipollo y así atender mejor a sus clientes. Este es el quinto préstamo de Francisca con MFP, sabe que tiene que pagarlo a tiempo sino quiere causarle problemas a las socias de su banco comunal, donde es muy solidaria con las demás. Con los 2500 soles de préstamo planea comprar una nueva carretilla de salchipollo, para mejorar sus ingresos.
texts.en:
Francisca is a 44-year old woman who is a fighter that is persistent with her goals. She lives in a house that was willed to her by her parents and she wants most to get ahead in life. A salchipollo cart (meals made of fried chicken and noodles) is Francisca’s daily companion that she takes to sell prepared meals in the Bolognesi Plaza (an important plaza in the city of Juliaca).

She starts at 7 PM and gives appointments to eat the delicious salchipollos that she prepares for her clients. She enjoys cooking for her clients as she’s having fun doing it. She’s been running this business for 18-years and the most difficult part of the job has been walking the streets at night, sometimes in the freezing cold.

In the future, she longs to have a shop in the center of town where she can sell great salchipollo meals and services her clients better. This is the fifth loan that Francisca has taken with MFP. She knows that she’ll have to repay the debt on time as she doesn’t want to cause problems for the community bank. The bank has the support of all its members. With this loan of 2500 soles she plans to purchase a new salchipollo cart to earn better profits.

Translated from Spanish by Jenson Abraham, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Compra de una carretilla nueva para su negocio

loans.name: Julio

texts.es: Julio tiene 34 años, siempre ha sabido salir adelante por sus propios medios, vive en un cuarto alquilado y ahora lo que más desea es mejorar su vida. Pasa sus días en las calles de la ciudad de Juliaca, sale muy temprano a vender puerta por puerta sus productos naturales, los cuales consisten en hiervas curativas, mates, esencias, etc, también cuando la situación es propicia sube a los buses que salen con destino a Ayaviri, Azangaro o Huancane. Lleva 5 años realizando esta actividad y lo que más le gusta es conversar con sus clientes e informales sobre las ventajas de sus productos, pero lo que menos le gusta es tener que caminar tanto, para lograr una venta, aun así sabe que tiene que seguir trabajando duro para alcanzar sus metas. En el futuro espera hacer crecer su negocio y tener una tienda propia donde oferte sus hierbas con más tranquilidad. Este es el quinto préstamo de Julio con MFP, siempre fue muy puntual en sus pagos y espera serlo ahora también, en su banco comunal es un socio muy responsable y alegre. Con los 2000 soles solicitados planea incrementar la cantidad de productos que vende, para así mejorar sus ingresos.
texts.en:
Julio is 34-years old and is always looking to get ahead by his own means. He lives in a rented room and now desires to have a better life. He spends his days in the streets of Juliaca city leaving early to sell natural products door-to-door which consist of healing herbs, mates, essences , etc. Also, when the situation is right he sells his products at the bus stops for Ayaviri, Azangaro or Huancane.

He’s been this activity for the last 5-years and he really enjoys conversing with his clients and informing them about the advantages of his products, but the thing is likes the least is have to walk everywhere to make one sale, but he knows he still has to work hard to achieve his goals.

In the future, he wants to grow the business and have a proper store to offer his herbs with a peace of mind. This is the fifth loan request for Julio through MFP and he always repays his debts punctually as he wants to be on time for his community bank as it’s a very responsible and respected society. With this 2000 soles he plans to increase his inventory of products to earn bigger profits.

Translated from Spanish by Jenson Abraham, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Increase his inventory

loans.name: Maria

texts.es: Maria es una madre muy amorosa y trabajadora, vive en su propia casa junto a sus 3 hijos; Maria de 20, Tony de 23 y Lucy de 25, a quienes ama mucho y desea dar un buen futuro. Sus días comienzan muy temprano por la mañana cuando habré su tienda de abarrotes y empieza a atender a sus habituales clientes, su tienda es muy concurrida, ya que está situada en un lugar muy transitado, además, el carisma y la alegría que le pone Maria a sus ventas han hecho que su bodega se convierta en una de las principales de su barrio. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es que puede realizar las tareas domésticas al mismo tiempo que atiende su bodega. Lleva 7 años en esta actividad y lo más difícil es tener que permanecer todo el día dentro de su tienda sin poder salir a realizar sus actividades. Para el futuro, anhela mejorar la infraestructura de su tienda, hacerla más grande para que sus clientes puedan comprar con mayor tranquilidad. Este es el primer préstamo de Maria con MFP, se siente muy feliz de la oportunidad brindada, y está dispuesta a pagar todas sus cuotas a tiempo, en su banco comunal es una socia muy responsable. Con los 1000 soles de préstamo, planea aumentar la cantidad de mercadería que vende, para mejorar sus ingresos económicos.
texts.en:
Maria is a very hardworking and loving mother who lives in a proper house with her 3 children; Maria is 20, Tony is 23 and Lucy is 25 and she loves them so much and desires to give them a better future. These days she starts early in the morning when she opens her store and starts serving her repeat customers. Her shop is very busy as it’s located in a well trafficked location, also, the charisma and joy Maria brings to her sales makes her store a major part of the neighborhood.

The thing she likes most about the job are the domestic tasks and at the same time she enjoys attending to the shop. She has been at this profession for 7-years but finds it difficult to roam the store all day long without being able to realize other activities.

For the future, she’d like to improve on the infrastructure of the shop to make it better for her clients to shop with a peace of mind. This is the first loan for Maria through MFP and she is very happy to be able to have it and will be repay her debt promptly as she has a responsibility to her community bank. With this loan of 1000 soles she plans to increase her inventory of product to earn better profits.

Translated from Spanish by Jenson Abraham, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To increase inventory of products

loans.name: Maria

texts.es: Maria tiene 47 años, desde muy joven siempre se preocupó por salir adelante en la vida, vive en su casa propia y lo que más desea es mejorar su calidad de vida. Su negocio son los metales, tiene un taller donde los moldea y convierte en estructuras útiles, como carritos sangucheros, carretillas, triciclos, etc. Actualmente cuenta con 3 trabajadores que laboran en su taller y son los principales ayudantes que tiene en su negocio. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es vender sus productos, ya que en su negocio ella es la encargada de hacerlo. Lleva 27 años en esta actividad y lo que menos le gusta es tener que conseguir los metales para moldear, ya que transportarlos le resulta muy pesado y cansado. Para el fututo, espera hacer crecer su negocio y convertirlo en uno de los principales de la ciudad de Juliaca. Este es el cuarto préstamo de Maria con MFP y al igual como hizo con sus primeros créditos está dispuesta a pagar todas sus cuotas a tiempo, en su banco comunal es muy querida ya que siempre esta preocupada por el bienestar de las demás socias. Con los 3000 soles que solicita planea comprar más metales para trabajar mejor y realizar adecuadamente sus pedidos.
texts.en:
Maria is 47-years old who from an early age was always concerned with getting ahead in life. She lives in a proper house and desire very much so to have a better quality of life. Her business is metals and she has a shop where they mold and convert metals into useful structures, like sangucheros (trolleys, carts and tricycles, etc.) In actuality, she has 3 workers laboring in the shop and they are the main assistants in the shop.

The thing she likes about her job is selling the products because since it’s her business she feels responsible to sell. She’s been doing this for 27-years, but the thing she likes least is molding the metals and transporting the resulting products as it’s very heavy and tiresome.

For the future, she hopes to make her business an integral part of the city of Juliaca. This is the 4th loan request that Maria has taken through MFP and just as she did with her first request she plans to repay her debt promptly as she cares a lot for her community bank and is also concerned with making it the best. With 3000 soles she plans to purchase more metals to work better and gain more orders.

Translated from Spanish by Jenson Abraham, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: to buy metals

loans.name: Martina

texts.es: Martina tiene 55 años, es una madre muy admirada, aunque sus hijos ya no viven bajo su mismo techo, todavía vela por ellos, vive en su propia casa y anhela que sus hijos tengan la mejor D. las vidas. Martina tiene un puesto D. venta D. golosinas, el cual es muy concurrido, ya que se encuentra en uno D. los parques más importantes D. la ciudad D. Juliaca, ella es una vendedora muy convincente y siempre persuaD. a las personas D. que se lleven algo para ir saboreando en el camino. Lleva 8 años en este negocio y lo que más le gusta es conversar con sus vecinas D. venta, pero lo que menos le gusta es permanecer todo el día en su puesto bajo el inclemente sol y sin poder ir a ningún lado. Para más adelante espera tener una tienda para poder trabajar con mayor tranquilidad. Este es el primer préstamo D. Martina con MFP, sabe que tiene que pagar todas sus cuotas a tiempo para no perjudicar a las socias D. su banco comunal, en el cual es muy querida por las responsabilidad que demuestra. Con los 1000 soles que solicita planea incrementar la cantidad D. productos que tiene en su puesto, para así tener más mercadería que vender a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Martina who is 55 years old is a much admired mother. Although her children do not live under the same roof, she watches over them. She lives in her own house and wants her children to have the best of lives. Martina has a stand selling sweets which is very popular as it is located in one of the most important parks in the city of Juliaca. She is a very convincing saleswoman and always persuades people to take something to eat on their way. She has had this business for 8 years and what she most likes it to talk with her neighboring saleswomen but what she likes least it to remain at her stand all day in the inclement sun and without being able to go anywhere. In the future she hopes to have a store to be able to work with greater ease. This is Martina’s first loan with MFP and she knows that she has to make all of her payments on time to not harm the members of the communal bank where she is much loved for the responsibility that she demonstrates. With the 1000 soles that she is requesting she plans to increase the amount of products that she has at her stand to be able to have more merchandise to sell to her customers.

Translated from Spanish by Aimee Sostowski, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To Increase Merchandise

loans.name: Mery

texts.es: Mery es una joven de 23 años, muy trabajadora y decidida, vive en la casa que le cedieron  sus padres y espera con su trabajo poder salir adelante. Su puesto de artesanías está ubicado en el mercado San José (mercado Importante de la ciudad de Juliaca), el cual es muy concurrido debido a los modelos llamativos y novedosos que teje, ella siempre recibe a sus clientes, quienes en su mayoría son turistas, con una sonrisa y les muestra muy amablemente las artesanías que vende. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es tejer, ya que desde muy niña tuvo mucha pasión por realizar este arte.
